description: Ice Cream Social Club is a Custom Dessert Trailer created by Chef Ralph Rendsland. Rendsland is a Culinary Institute of America graduate and seasoned Special Event Professional.The trailer was a perfect addition to add and complete THREE2OH! Liquid Nitrogen Ice Cream Systems which Rendsland started 3 years ago and supplies portable Ice Cream and Frozen Libations bars to the Special Event Industry. The custom trailer designed to look like an old fashion ice cream parlor is equipped to make custom ice cream, gelatos and sorbets on site with a 270 liter nitrogen tank and induction cooking systems. The menu brings to you many classics like Bananas Foster, Cherries Jubilee, Root Beer Floats and Homemade Ice Cream Sandwiches.The staff at Ice Cream Social Club are professionally attired and trained in customer service and the “ART OF THE PERFECT SCOOP.”We look forward to serving you for your next Special Event.
name: Ice Cream Social Club
